name: UpdateMetricsForGroupType
description:
Update metrics for a specific group type in a project.

This tool updates metrics for a specified group type within a project in Datadog. It should be called when metrics need to be modified or adjusted for a particular group type associated with a project.

parameters.name: group_type_position
parameters.description: The index of the group type to update within the metrics. It should be an integer value.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project you want to access. Retrieve it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: group_usage_metric_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the group usage metric to update.

parameters.name: group_type_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the group type to update metrics for.

parameters.name: group_metric_name
parameters.description: The name of the metric to update for the specified group type.

parameters.name: metric_format_type
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the metric. Can be 'numeric' or 'currency'. Choose 'numeric' for plain numbers and 'currency' for currency representation.

parameters.name: update_interval_days
parameters.description: Number of days to set as the interval for updating metrics.

parameters.name: metric_display_type
parameters.description: Defines how the metric should be displayed: 'number' or 'sparkline'.

parameters.name: filter_conditions
parameters.description: Conditions to filter the metrics. Specify as a string, e.g., 'status:active'.
